languages.text: {n}Немного подумав, Кассия согласно кивает.{/n} "Быть может, я потеряю свой шанс на свободу. Пусть так. Зато разум и силы останутся мне подвластны. Безумцам не место в Империуме. Безумным навигаторам... тем более".

traits.locale_text: {n}Немного подумав, Кассия согласно кивает.{/n} "Быть может, я потеряю свой шанс на свободу. Пусть так. Зато разум и силы останутся мне подвластны. Безумцам не место в Империуме. Безумным Навигаторам... тем более".

languages.text: {n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."
languages.original_text: {n}Немного подумав, Кассия согласно кивает.{/n} "Быть может, я потеряю свой шанс на свободу. Пусть так. Зато разум и силы останутся мне подвластны. Безумцам не место в Империуме. Безумным навигаторам... тем более".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia considers your words, then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is all the more true."

{n}Cassia considers your words, then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is all the more true."

{n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my shot at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is all the more true."

{n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

{n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

languages.text: {n}カシアはあなたの言葉をよく考えてから、同意するように頷いた。{/n}「もしかしたら、私は自由を失うかもしれません。それでも構わない。そうすれば、私の心と力は私だけのものとなるのですから。帝国に狂気を持ち込む必要などありません。狂った航宙士なら…なおさらです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはあなたの言葉をよく考えてから、同意するように頷いた。{/n}「もしかしたら、私は自由を失うかもしれません。それでも構わない。そうすれば、私の心と力は私だけのものとなるのですから。帝国に狂気を持ち込む必要などありません。狂った航宙士なら…なおさらです」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅思考了一会儿，之后赞同地点了点头。{/n}“虽然这么做，我可能再也无法重获自由，但就这样吧。这样一来，至少我的思想与力量仍属于我。疯子在帝国没有容身之处，对于发疯的导航者而言……恐怕更是如此。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅思考了一会儿，之后赞同地点了点头。{/n}“虽然这块石头可能会夺走我的自由，但就这样吧。这样一来，至少我的思想与力量仍属于我。疯子在帝国没有容身之处，对于发疯的导航者而言……更是如此。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia reflexiona sobre tus palabras y asiente.{/n} «Tal vez pierda mi oportunidad de ser libre. Que así sea. Al menos mi mente y mis poderes seguirán siendo míos. No hay lugar para la locura en el Imperium. No digamos ya para los Navegantes locos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia reflexiona sobre tus palabras y asiente.{/n} «Tal vez pierda mi oportunidad de ser libre. Que así sea. Al menos mi mente y mis poderes seguirán siendo míos. No hay lugar para la locura en el Imperium. No digamos ya para los Navegantes locos...».

languages.text: {n}Cassia denkt über deine Worte nach und nickt dann zustimmend.{/n} "Vielleicht verliere ich meine Chance auf Freiheit. So sei es. Auf diese Weise kann ich meinen Verstand und meine Kräfte weiter selbst befehligen. Im Imperium ist kein Platz für Wahnsinn. Für wahnsinnige Navigatoren ... das erst recht nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia denkt über deine Worte nach und nickt dann zustimmend.{/n} "Vielleicht verliere ich meine Chance auf Freiheit. So sei es. Auf diese Weise kann ich meinen Verstand und meine Kräfte weiter selbst befehligen. Im Imperium ist kein Platz für Wahnsinn. Für wahnsinnige Navigatoren ... das erst recht nicht."

languages.text: {n}Cassia prend quelques secondes pour réfléchir à vos paroles avant d'acquiescer.{/n} « Je ne serai donc peut-être jamais libre. Tant pis. Ainsi, mon esprit et mes pouvoirs demeureront sous mon contrôle. La folie n'a pas sa place dans l'Imperium. Et les navigateurs fous encore moins. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia prend quelques secondes pour réfléchir à vos paroles avant d'acquiescer.{/n} « Je ne serai donc peut-être jamais libre. Qu'il en soit ainsi. Ainsi, mon esprit et mes pouvoirs demeureront sous mon contrôle. La folie n'a pas sa place dans l'Imperium. Et les navigateurs fous encore moins. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, söylediklerini göz önünde bulundurup başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Özgürlüğümü kazanma şansımı kaybedebilirim, mümkündür. Peki madem. Bu şekilde kendi aklıma ve gücüme hâkim olurum. İmparatorluk'ta deliliğe yer yoktur. Hele deli Rotacılara asla."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia considers your words and then nods in agreement.{/n} "Perhaps I might lose my chance at freedom. So be it. That way, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia söylediklerini göz önünde bulundurup baş sallayarak onaylıyor.{/n} "Özgürlüğümü kazanma şansımı kaybedebilirim, mümkündür. Peki madem. Böylelikle kendi aklıma ve gücüme kendim hâkim olabilirim. İmparatorluk'ta deliliğe yer yoktur. Deli Rotacılara ise asla."
